translation.en: [Male Speaker] There is no close substitute for water.
translation.zh: 水没有相近的替代物

translation.en: [Female Speaker] It's the most precious resource we have.
translation.zh: 水没有相近的替代物 水是人类最珍贵的资源

translation.en: [Female Speaker] We are not treating it as a crisis
translation.zh:
水是人类最珍贵的资源 我们从不把水资源问题视为危机
其实我们应该重视这个危机

translation.en: when we should be treating it as a crisis.
translation.zh:
我们从不把水资源问题视为危机
其实我们应该重视这个危机

translation.en: Imagine if tomorrow, we cured cancer,
translation.zh: 想象治愈癌症的解药明天就找到

translation.en: and in a hundred years,
translation.zh: 但100年后

translation.en: there were still a million kids dying of cancer.
translation.zh: 仍有数百万孩童死于癌症

translation.en: It would be unthinkable,
translation.zh: 那是难以想象的局面

translation.en: but that's the situation we find ourselves in with water.
translation.zh: 这就是水资源问题目前面临的情势

translation.en: The government has failed
translation.zh: 政府并没有向民众传达

translation.en: in telling the population the truth about the situation that we are facing.
translation.zh: 我们所面临的实质情况

translation.en: [Narrator] About 7.7 billion people have inherited the Earth.
translation.zh: 七十七亿人口继承了地球上的资源

translation.en: Almost two billion of us are struggling to survive without clean drinking water.
translation.zh:
其中二十亿人口
仍无法取得干净的饮用水过活

translation.en: The water crisis isn't imminent. It isn't looming.
translation.zh:
水资源危机不是近在咫尺
不是可预见的问题

translation.en: It's here... now.
translation.zh: 因为当下正在发生

translation.en: The UN estimated that by 2025,
translation.zh: 联合国预计 到了2025年

translation.en: 1.8 billion people will be living in water stress regions.
translation.zh:
全球将有十八亿人
生活在缺乏净水的地区

translation.en: People are not gonna be starving and dying instantly.
translation.zh: 人不会马上饿死

translation.en: They're gonna be moving. They won't have the resources to live where they're at.
translation.zh: 一旦缺乏资源 他们就会搬走

translation.en: [Narrator] Contrary to popular thought,
translation.zh: 跟多数人所想的不同

translation.en: this crisis isn't just a developing world problem.
translation.zh:
水资源危机
并不只是发展中国家面临的问题

translation.en: It is already beginning to impact everyone everywhere.
translation.zh:
而是已经开始对全球各地的人
造成影响

translation.en: Our changing climate is less forgiving, keeping more water for itself.
translation.zh:
气候变化问题日趋严重
水位渐渐升高

translation.en: Pollution is corrupting our supplies.
translation.zh: 水资源供应被污染

translation.en: Infrastructures are failing faster than they can be repaired.
translation.zh:
供水设备损坏的速度
比不上修复的速度

translation.en: And everyday, there are more people in the world all thirsting for water.
translation.zh: 面对缺水问题的人日益增长

translation.en: More often than not, a water crisis isn't an act of nature.
translation.zh:
很多时候
水资源危机不是大自然演化的结果

translation.en: It's an act of humankind.
translation.zh: 而是人为因素所导致

translation.en: By not planning, by not using the right technologies,
translation.zh: 我们省略策划、不采用适合的科技

translation.en: and by not acting soon enough,
translation.zh: 后知后觉

translation.en: we set ourselves up to fail.
translation.zh: 这场抗争注定失败

translation.en: [Narrator] It's a truly daunting crisis,
translation.zh: 这场危机令人十分担忧

translation.en: but what if the solutions were already at hand?
translation.zh: 但如果我们已经有了解决方案了呢？

translation.en: Right now all around the globe, an army of visionaries and innovators
translation.zh:
如今全球各地都有一群
见识高远、勇于创新的战士

translation.en: is working to reimagine and reinvent water systems
translation.zh: 他们致力于重新定义与重塑供水体系

translation.en: to generate, supply, and clean the water
translation.zh: 以生产、供应和净化

translation.en: we all depend on for our very lives.
translation.zh: 我们赖以生存的水源

translation.en: The water challenges facing the world really fall into three categories.
translation.zh:
要应付全球水资源问题
我们有三大困难

translation.en: First is the scarcity of water.
translation.zh: 第一 是缺水

translation.en: Second is building resilient infrastructure against climate change.
translation.zh:
第二 是要建造出
足以抵抗气候变化的硬体设施

translation.en: And third is doing all that in a way that's affordable for society.
translation.zh:
第三 是要确保民众负担得起
相关计划的费用

translation.en: The problem with this crisis is
translation.zh: 水资源危机最大的挑战

translation.en: the water that's drinkable is gonna start disappearing
translation.zh: 是饮用水逐渐减少

translation.en: and the water that's not drinkable is gonna start appearing everywhere.
translation.zh:
不能饮用的水
开始出现在世界各个角落

translation.en: There are solutions.
translation.zh: 解决方案已经有了

translation.en: It's just a matter of bringing them to bear on the problem and we can fix it.
translation.zh:
如今只差实践了
我们有能力解决这个危机

translation.en: We are running against the clock in terms of solving these issues.
translation.zh: 解决相关困难的时间越来越少

translation.en: In a sense, it breaks my heart that we have the solutions, right? And then we can't get them out fast enough.
translation.zh:
解决方案已经有了
却无法及时实施 令我很心痛

translation.en: The demand for water to sustain not only the population
translation.zh: 我们对使用干净的水来维系人口

translation.en: but the lifestyle that we have
translation.zh: 我们对使用干净的水来维系人口 以及维持生活形态的需求

translation.en: has grown just tremendously,
translation.zh: 近年来大大增加

translation.en: but we're still trying to do things
translation.zh:
近年来大大增加 但我们仍以旧有的方式
来解决当前危机

translation.en: the way we've done them in the past.
translation.zh:
但我们仍以旧有的方式
来解决当前危机

translation.en: Back around the turn of the century,
translation.zh: 上一世纪

translation.en: really everybody was responsible for their own sewage.
translation.zh: 上一世纪 人们要自己处理从自家排出的污水

translation.en: They were responsible for their own water. They drilled a well, dug a well,
translation.zh: 人们要自己寻找水源 掘井取水

translation.en: or they got water out of a creek.
translation.zh: 人们要自己寻找水源 掘井取水 到小溪取水

translation.en: And then they used a pit latrine
translation.zh: 使用蹲坑厕所

translation.en: or a sewage lagoon behind the house.
translation.zh: 在自家后院挖污水池

translation.en: Of course, there were public health issues with that. People were getting sick,
translation.zh: 难免出现卫生问题

translation.en: and so the governments around the world kinda stepped in and said
translation.zh:
有人因此生病
于是全球政府开始介入

translation.en: that this is an intrinsic government function.
translation.zh: 并表示这是内政部的责任

translation.en: We need to provide for the safety
translation.zh:
并表示这是内政部的责任 执政单位必须打造出
安全与健康的社区

translation.en: and welfare of the community,
translation.zh:
执政单位必须打造出
安全与健康的社区

translation.en: and money's really no object.
translation.zh: 费用多少不在话下

translation.en: So they ended up with these incredibly expensive sewer systems
translation.zh: 于是政府开始建设天价排水系统

translation.en: where there's a pipe to everybody's house.
translation.zh: 于是政府开始建设天价排水系统 把水管接入每户人家

translation.en: There's a water pipe to everybody's house,
translation.zh: 把水管接入每户人家

translation.en: there's a sewer pipe to everybody's house.
translation.zh: 从此每户人家有了净水管和排水管

translation.en: Incredibly complex networks of systems
translation.zh: 这种管道系统错综复杂

translation.en: that get old and all have to be replaced.
translation.zh:
这种管道系统错综复杂 一旦旧了以后必须替换
随之而来的维修费也是天价

translation.en: And huge expense associated with it,
translation.zh:
一旦旧了以后必须替换
随之而来的维修费也是天价

translation.en: but it provided a safe environment.
translation.zh:
一旦旧了以后必须替换
随之而来的维修费也是天价 但确乎为人提供了安全的生活环境

translation.en: It dealt with the public health issues associated with that.
translation.zh: 也成功解决了相关公共卫生问题

translation.en: [Narrator ] Attempting to engineer our way our of trouble
translation.zh: 为了解决水资源危机

translation.en: is deepening the problem.
translation.zh: 我们不得不深入探讨这个问题

translation.en: As we throw more and more resources at outmoded infrastructure,
translation.zh:
我们目前仍然将越来越多资源
投入到过时的硬体设施中

translation.en: the challenge is to let go of an older inefficient system
translation.zh: 因此摒弃旧有、缺乏效率的体系

translation.en: and start to open our minds to new ways of managing water.
translation.zh:
接纳新形式的水务管理方案
是当下要面对的挑战

translation.en: Nothing focuses the mind like a crisis.
translation.zh: 没什么比一场危机更容易引起关注

translation.en: So when Flint, Michigan faced a shocking crisis
translation.zh: 因此密歇根州弗林特市爆发

translation.en: of lead contamination in its drinking water,
translation.zh: 因此密歇根州弗林特市爆发 饮用水铅污染事件后

translation.en: activists not only demanded change,
translation.zh: 社运人士不仅要求改变

translation.en: but actively sought creative solutions to the problem.
translation.zh: 也积极寻找创新的解决方案

translation.en: One such creatively focused mind
translation.zh: 拥有这种创新思维的人

translation.en: belongs to rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Jaden Smith.
translation.zh:
是饶舌歌手
演员兼企业家贾登史密斯

translation.en: My motivation around water
translation.zh: 我从11岁开始

translation.en: started when I was about 11 years old.
translation.zh: 我从11岁开始 就有了改善供水的想法

translation.en: And it came from me learning about the environment
translation.zh: 我透过学校老师

translation.en: from my teachers in school.
translation.zh: 理解到环境危机

translation.en: It got to the point where I really wanted to make an active change
translation.zh: 因此我希望能为环境带来积极的改变

translation.en: and I wanted to do something that could make a difference in the world.
translation.zh: 我想要做一件改变世界的事

translation.en: I always wanted to go above and beyond
translation.zh: 我一直想要超越极限

translation.en: and just go across the world and make an impact, and make a change, you know?
translation.zh: 前往世界各地 创造影响力和改变

translation.en: I want to put a filtration system in Africa.
translation.zh: 我想在非洲设立滤水系统

translation.en: I want to put a filtration system in India.
translation.zh: 也想在印度设立滤水系统

translation.en: As I started to evolve these ideas,
translation.zh: 开始有了这些想法后

translation.en: I started to realize that we have problems so close to home.
translation.zh: 我发现这些问题其实近在咫尺

translation.en: We have water sanitation issues that are right here in our backyard
translation.zh: 净水污染问题就发生在自家后院

translation.en: that need to be addressed.
translation.zh: 这事必须受到重视

translation.en: And seeing the effect
translation.zh: 这场危机已经影响到

translation.en: that this crisis has had on everyone in Flint, Michigan.
translation.zh: 这场危机已经影响到 密歇根州弗林特市的每户人家

translation.en: When you see the kids there and when you see the elderly people,
translation.zh: 看着那边的儿童和老人

translation.en: that still they can't use the water that's coming out of the pipes,
translation.zh: 无法使用从水管流出来的水

translation.en: it's heart wrenching.
translation.zh: 真令人心痛

translation.en: We wanted to give back to that community
translation.zh: 我们希望能回馈当地社群

translation.en: and purify the water for people who don't have access for clean water.
translation.zh: 为无法接触净水的人净化水源

translation.en: That is why we did The Water Box in Flint.
translation.zh: 于是我们决定在弗林特市放置滤水箱

translation.en: What it does is it filters water
translation.zh: 滤水箱提供滤水功能

translation.en: and it delivers 10 gallons of clean water every 60 seconds.
translation.zh: 每60分钟供应10公吨的净水

translation.en: It's specifically made to filter out the lead
translation.zh: 其主要作用是滤除饮用水的铅含量

translation.en: and we have people on site that are testing the water every single day.
translation.zh: 我们每天会派人到现场测试饮用水

translation.en: The entire plan and the goal to make it work here first
translation.zh: 整个计划的宗旨是 先确保有关系统能在弗林特市运作

translation.en: and then to take it places across the world that are having the same issues and say okay,
translation.zh:
再将其带到世界上
其他有水污染的地方

translation.en: well maybe this is not a lead problem over here,
translation.zh: 万一污染当地水源的物质不是铅

translation.en: so we can change the configuration of the machine.
translation.zh: 那我们大可改变滤水箱的结构

translation.en: The goal is to have it wherever it would be necessary
translation.zh: 目标是把滤水箱放在有需要的地方

translation.en: and to modify it for that specific places
translation.zh: 按照不同地区的需求进行改造

translation.en: so that it wold work efficiently just as it does in Flint.
translation.zh: 确保其能像弗林特市的滤水箱般凑效

translation.en: Water is viewed as a global issue because it affects everybody on the planet,
translation.zh:
水资源危机被视为全球性问题
因为波及每个生活在地球上的人

translation.en: but really at it's heart, it's a local issue,
translation.zh: 但事实上是地方性问题

translation.en: because we have to deal with it city by city, town by town.
translation.zh: 因为需要走访每座城市、每个小镇

translation.en: So what we see is that people who are really at the coalface
translation.zh: 因此我们发现 站在前线的人

translation.en: who are struggling with drought or deteriorating water quality,
translation.zh: 以及面对干旱或水质污染问题的人

translation.en: those are the people on the edges and on the fringes who are really innovating.
translation.zh: 他们处于第一线 他们创新求变

translation.en: And that's where the future lies.
translation.zh: 这些人就是未来所在

translation.en: [Narrator] One innovator on one such fringe is Beth Koiji
translation.zh: 贝丝寇基就是站在前线的创新家

translation.en: who had to think outside the box when her well ran dry.
translation.zh:
她家的井水干涸后
必须靠创意寻找解决方案

translation.en: When I was doing my undergraduate,
translation.zh: 大学求学期间

translation.en: I think I was tired of getting on and off waterborne diseases.
translation.zh:
我受不了水资源匮乏和水媒疾病
所带来的困扰

translation.en: So I started making my own water filter in my dorm,
translation.zh: 于是开始在宿舍打造自己的滤水器

translation.en: that heal or remove all bacterias.
translation.zh: 这款滤水器具有杀菌作用

translation.en: I started going to community with it
translation.zh: 后来我开始在社群中宣传净水概念

translation.en: showing people how to make a simple filter in your house
translation.zh: 教人怎么自己在家制作简单的滤水器

translation.en: because actually filters are not that cheap in Kenya.
translation.zh: 毕竟滤水器在肯尼亚不便宜

translation.en: And in 2016, Kenya was facing a huge drought
translation.zh: 在2016年 肯尼亚遭受严重旱灾打击

translation.en: and we felt that people now didn't see filters as a solution
translation.zh: 我们发现人们不再仰赖滤水器

translation.en: because they actually don't have enough water to filter.
translation.zh:
毕竟能不能取得充足的饮用水
已经成了问题

translation.en: The only choice here is to fetch water from the river.
translation.zh: 唯一取得饮用水的方法是到河边取水

translation.en: Children are sent to the river the whole day
translation.zh: 长辈会吩咐孩子白天到河边取水

translation.en: so they don't attend school.
translation.zh: 导致孩子无法上学

translation.en: The water has high level of chemical contaminants,
translation.zh: 河水含有大量的化学污染物质

translation.en: so basically, you cannot drink that water.
translation.zh: 无法直接饮用

translation.en: So we were looking at something specific
translation.zh: 因此我们致力于研发一种

translation.en: that is able to utilize the humidity in air.
translation.zh: 将空气中的水分转化为饮用水的机器

translation.en: [Narrator] Frustrated with her own experience
translation.zh: 眼见祖国被缺水危机肆虐

translation.en: of watching water scarcity ravage her country,
translation.zh: 贝丝在痛心疾首下

translation.en: Beth looks to nature to solve the problem.
translation.zh: 向大自然寻求解决方案

translation.en: Getting water from air has never been a new concept.
translation.zh:
从空气中采集水分
在大自然生态中屡见不鲜

translation.en: In nature, there are some Namibian beetle
translation.zh:
从空气中采集水分
在大自然生态中屡见不鲜 有些纳米布沙漠甲虫

translation.en: that actually have its drinking water from the atmosphere.
translation.zh: 便是直接从空气中吸取水分

translation.en: There's six times more water in the atmosphere than there is in all the wells around the world.
translation.zh:
空气中的水分
比全球各地河流的水分要多出六倍

translation.en: So that is a huge resource that is yet to be properly tapped.
translation.zh: 空气是个未被完善开发的巨大水资源

translation.en: [Narrator] She designed a machine that extracts clean water from the atmosphere
translation.zh:
她设计了一台
能直接从空气中收集水分的机器

translation.en: and she calls it Majik.
translation.zh: 取名为“神奇集水器”

translation.en: Beth took her invention to the Ark Children's Orphanage
translation.zh: 贝丝将她的发明带到方舟孤儿院

translation.en: so kids could focus on education
translation.zh: 如此一来 孩子们就能专注接受教育

translation.en: instead of walking miles for water.
translation.zh: 而非走到远处去取水

translation.en: These technologies are very, very simple.
translation.zh: 这些科技并不复杂

translation.en: It works the same as the refrigerator and an air conditioner.
translation.zh: 其作用原理跟冰箱和空调一样

translation.en: The air is pulled in by a fan
translation.zh: 利用风扇引入空气

translation.en: and then passed through a condenser coil.
translation.zh: 空气经过制冷盘管

translation.en: That's where the condensing happens
translation.zh: 这里水分从气态变成液态

translation.en: and then the water is dispensed to a collecting tank.
translation.zh: 之后过滤并储存在水箱中供饮用

translation.en: We just came from a very dry season,
translation.zh: 我们刚经历了一场非常干燥的旱季

translation.en: so this was the only source of drinking water for these children.
translation.zh: 这是小朋友唯一的饮用水资源

translation.en: It's for security for them.
translation.zh: 为他们提供健康保障

translation.en: As long as you have air, you can have clean drinking water.
translation.zh: 只要有空气 就能取得饮用水

translation.en: [Narrator] Technological innovation isn't enough
translation.zh:
在这种地方
取得干净饮用水如此简单的事

translation.en: in places where the primary obstacle
translation.zh: 竟然是一大挑战

translation.en: to obtaining clean water is something as simple as it is elusive.
translation.zh: 这个时候 单靠科技是不够的

translation.en: Money.
translation.zh: 还要靠财力

translation.en: Today in 2019, it's a million children a year under the age of five die
translation.zh:
2019年
有一百万名五岁以下的儿童

translation.en: because they lack access to safe water and sanitation.
translation.zh: 因缺乏安全饮用水和卫生设施而死亡

translation.en: The very first water collection I went on
translation.zh: 第一次参加集水之行

translation.en: was when the magnitude of the problem hit me.
translation.zh: 我就深深感受到该问题的严重性

translation.en: I was in a very rural village in Zambia
translation.zh:
当时我人在赞比亚
一个非常偏僻的村庄里

translation.en: and I was with this 14 year old girl.
translation.zh: 身边有个14岁的女孩

translation.en: She picked up the jerry can, I picked up a jerry can,
translation.zh: 我们手里各拿着一个空油桶

translation.en: and we walked off together with an interpreter.
translation.zh:
身边还有个翻译员
我们一起走路去取水

translation.en: And we walked about a while to this bore-well to fill these jerry cans.
translation.zh:
我们走到一个水井旁
去装满这些空油桶

translation.en: I asked her, "What are you gonna do when you grow up?
translation.zh: 我问她：“你长大后想做什么？

translation.en: "Are you gonna live here in this village?"
translation.zh: 我问她：“你长大后想做什么？ 你会不会继续待在这个村子里？”

translation.en: And she looked around. She was like, "No, I'm not staying here."
translation.zh: 她回头望着我说：“不会 我会离开”

translation.en: She goes, "I'm going to Lusaka, "I'm going to the big city."
translation.zh: 她继续说：“我会搬到大城市卢萨卡

translation.en: She's like, "I'm gonna be a nurse."
translation.zh: 当一个护士”

translation.en: It reminded me of being 14, and with Ben Affleck,
translation.zh:

translation.zh: 只是其中一个水消耗量极大的工业

translation.zh: 印度的面料生产公司

translation.zh: 便是水消耗量最高的用户

translation.zh: 大部分面料工厂

translation.zh: 都是区域性污染的罪魁祸首

translation.zh:
水源被染料

translation.zh: 导致附近居民失去饮用水

translation.zh: 2010年 印度政府下令

translation.zh: 净化所有漂染工厂 否则就得关闭

translation.en: threatening 55,000 jobs.
translation.zh: 导致五万五千个人面临失业危机

translation.zh: 后来印度南部一家面料工厂的厂主

translation.zh:
站起来接受挑战
从而发现了一个处理废水的永续方案

translation.zh: 为该区域的其他工厂立下好榜样

translation.zh: 为该区域的其他工厂立下好榜样 2010年 废水问题严重

translation.zh: 2010年 废水问题严重

translation.zh: 未经处理的废水排入河流

translation.zh: 使河水染上了颜色

translation.zh: 附近的漂染工厂 将化学物质排入诺伊特尔河

translation.zh: 将化学物质排入诺伊特尔河

translation.zh: 要是碰到河水 就会患上各种疾病

translation.zh: 要是碰到河水 就会患上各种疾病 脚板和大腿都会产生剧痛

translation.en: and have a burning sensation
translation.zh: 就像被火灼伤一样

translation.en: Now, we are putting on continuous efforts and our technologies are getting updated.
translation.zh: 我们不断努力改善水源和更新技术

translation.en: The river which was colored two decades ago,
translation.zh: 二十年前充满颜料的河流

translation.zh: 二十年前充满颜料的河流 如今已经恢复洁净

translation.zh: 工厂的废水排放量已经减至零

translation.zh:
漂染过程所排放出的漂白剂
化学物质和盐水

translation.en: is now treated instead of being flushed into local waterways.
translation.zh:
不再灌入附近的排水沟
而是送去处理

translation.zh:
拉胡尔的公司
不再提取河水作为工业用途

translation.en: Rahul's company is reusing over 90% of its textile processing water.
translation.zh:
90%的工业用水
都是面料生产下的再生水源

translation.en: Now the situation is much better compared to even five years back
translation.zh: 这年头的情况比五年前好多了

translation.en: Effluent from our factory which has brine in it,
translation.zh: 我们工厂排出的废水含有卤水

translation.zh: 颜料、盐分

translation.en: that is taken to a plant
translation.zh: 这些废水被送到一家工厂

translation.zh: 装进储存器中 放个24小时

translation.zh: 经处理后 被送往软化装置

translation.zh: 经处理后 被送往软化装置 然后是滤水膜装置

translation.zh: 从滤水膜流出的水便是再生水源

translation.en: And the reject from that is taken to the evaporator
translation.zh: 所排出的废料则被送进蒸发器

translation.zh: 从中得出盐晶体

translation.en: The water from the membrane
translation.zh: 从滤水膜装置取出的水

translation.zh:
以及从蒸发器获得的盐
将运回工厂使用

translation.zh: 90%工业用水都是再生水源

translation.zh: 化学物质、颜料 滤水膜是关键因素

translation.en: so it is all in a chain that we are developing ourselves.
translation.zh:
我们都站在
开发解决方案的同一阵线上

translation.zh:
我们都在致力于打造
更环保的面料产业

translation.en: I think it is high time now that everyone will have to realize and start doing it.
translation.zh:
我想我们是时候醒觉
并开始参与环保了

translation.en: No one can dodge with this anymore.
translation.zh: 谁也躲不了了

translation.zh: 在印度的另一个地区

translation.zh: 主要问题不是水源污染 而是供水

translation.zh:
2019年 这个坐拥一千万人口的城市

translation.zh:
这个坐拥一千万人口的城市
经历了一场难以想象的危机

translation.zh:
然而这种危机
如今已经逐渐演变成常态

translation.en: day zero,
translation.zh: 事发第一天

translation.en: when a city simply runs out of drinking water.
translation.zh: 这座城市的饮用水供应完全停摆

translation.zh: 金奈市民只追求一种东西

translation.zh: 那就是水

translation.zh:
金奈正面临水资源危机
去年全年无雨

translation.zh:
既缺乏地下水
雨水也没有获得妥善处理

translation.zh:
既缺乏地下水
雨水也没有获得妥善处理 所有水源都隔绝在外

translation.zh: 许多公寓大楼 必须依靠运水车供水

translation.zh: 必须依靠运水车供水

translation.zh:
最近有民众因运水车供水不足
连续示威四、五天

translation.en: They are left without having any water.
translation.zh: 最后一滴水也得不到

translation.en: Day by day, it is getting worse, so people need to just do something about it.
translation.zh:
缺水危机日益严重
我们必须设法解决问题

translation.en: [Narrator] Unlike most of Chennai's 10 million locals
translation.zh: 不像金奈境内的一千万人口

translation.en: who were desperate for water in the face of this crisis,
translation.zh:
面临缺水危机期间
大都迫切需要饮用水

translation.en: the almost 200 families in this Chennai apartment are not.
translation.zh:
这栋位于金奈的公寓大楼
有将近200户人家泰然处之

translation.en: How did these residents avoid purchasing costly water from tankers?
translation.zh:
这些居民究竟是怎么避免
向运水车购买高价水的？

translation.en: Resourcefulness.
translation.zh: 他们靠的是智慧

translation.en: See, as a teenager, I've never thought about it much.
translation.zh: 年轻时 我不会想太多

translation.en: But as a mother,
translation.zh: 但当上妈妈后

translation.en: I want to give important things like clean water to my kid.
translation.zh:
我希望能满足孩子基本的需求
例如干净的饮用水

translation.zh: 我们逐家逐户宣导收集雨水的重要性

translation.zh: 我们逐家逐户宣导收集雨水的重要性 并教导他们如何收集雨水

translation.en: Now, they're all trained up. Everybody's doing that.
translation.zh:
如今他们都受过训练
大家都跟着做了

translation.en: As a committee of commitment,
translation.zh: 这个社区有个坚持

translation.en: we decided that we are not going to buy a single drop of water.
translation.zh: 坚持不花半分钱买一滴水

translation.zh: 于是我们决定提升

translation.zh: 公寓的废水排放装置

translation.zh: 我们会提升废水处理装置

translation.en: We are going to upgrade our rain harvesting system.
translation.zh: 以及雨水收集系统

translation.zh: 我们把雨水导入雨水收集沟

translation.zh: 流向水井 我们会利用水井的水

translation.en: All this "upgradeation,"
translation.zh: 这些提升工程

translation.en: well, it has given us a fantastic result.
translation.zh: 皆带来相当显著的成效

translation.en: You can see behind me, there is a beautiful large green garden.
translation.zh:
你们可以在我身后看到
一大面积的美丽绿色花园

translation.en: You may be thinking
translation.zh: 你可能很好奇

translation.en: from where you are getting this much water to make this greenery?
translation.zh:
我们从来弄来大量的水
来灌溉这片绿地

translation.en: Absolutely, this is not here groundwater.
translation.zh: 用来灌溉的水绝对不是地下水

translation.en: This is water which we reused from the sewage treatment plant,
translation.zh: 而是我们从废水处理装置中取得的水

translation.en: so it looks lush and green.
translation.zh: 才显得如此茂密青葱

translation.en: When I look through my window, seeing all the other communities close by,
translation.zh: 每次从窗外望出去 看着附近的社区

translation.en: I wonder if they have the same water management system
translation.zh: 我想知道他们有没有也采用

translation.en: as we do here in our community
translation.zh: 我们社区的废水处理系统

translation.en: that would help solve all the water crisis problems.
translation.zh: 因为这能帮助他们解决水资源危机

translation.en: We feel every drop of water is so valuable and we are not letting it waste.
translation.zh:
我们认为每一滴水都很珍贵
所以绝不浪费

translation.en: It's a win-win situation.
translation.zh: 这是双赢局面

translation.en: Once you start to deal with water more locally,
translation.zh: 一旦我们开始解决地方性水源问题

translation.en: and that's a systems level change, not a technology change,
translation.zh: 即便只是改善系统 并非改变技术

translation.en: you reduce the capital costs
translation.zh: 也可减少资金成本

translation.en: and you make it much easier to reuse that water.
translation.zh: 让再生水源更普及

translation.en: I go back to the issue of scarcity.
translation.zh: 回来谈论缺水危机

translation.en: Water reuse, we believe,
translation.zh: 我们相信 使用再生水源

translation.en: is one of the smartest most efficient ways for us to deal with that issue.
translation.zh:
是应对缺水危机
最聪明、最有效的方案

translation.en: So more and more of the landscape
translation.zh: 因此越来越多地方

translation.en: is moving into indirect reuse and going to full water recycling.
translation.zh: 如今转为全面使用再生水源

translation.zh:
在加州

translation.zh:
在印度 我们看到
住在某栋大楼里的金奈市民

translation.zh:
在印度 我们看到

translation.zh: 有个叫水务企业联盟的组织

translation.zh: 开发出一种突破性的技术

translation.zh: 让人可以在家循环废水

translation.zh: 在生产业中

translation.zh: 规定要减少用水量

translation.zh: 农业亦然

translation.zh: 如今球扔到我们消费者手上

translation.zh: 我们很容易就浪费了大量的水

translation.zh: 毕竟我们家里不缺水

translation.zh:
Hydraloop
是一种居家型灰水循环系统

translation.en: so it recycles water from bath, shower, and washing machine,
translation.zh:
能有效循环从浴室
淋浴和洗衣机排出的废水

translation.zh:
废水净化后 重新为马桶
洗衣机、花园和泳池所使用

translation.zh:
重新为马桶
洗衣机、花园和泳池所使用

translation.zh: 我们发明了一个非常创新的净水系统

translation.zh: 也就是将六种既有的技术融为一体

translation.zh: 这些都是很简单的技术

translation.zh:
废水经过技术处理
转化成干净、清澈和安全的水

translation.en: and it's actually certified to the highest international standards
translation.zh: 更取得最高标准的国际验证

translation.en: so it can be reused again.
translation.zh: 因此可以循环使用

translation.zh: （吕伐登的屋主）

translation.en: And that's a lot of water actually.
translation.zh: 这水量可不小

translation.zh:
因此一整年下来
我们总共省下了三万公升的水

translation.en: It is our vision that in 20 years time,
translation.zh: 我们放眼20年后

translation.zh:
每间房子都必须设有
居家型废水循环系统

translation.zh:
我认为如果现在不开始… 采取永续生活方案
包括妥善处理废水

translation.zh:
采取永续生活方案
包括妥善处理废水

translation.zh: 全世界将会迎来一场环境灾难

translation.zh: 地球上将有八十五亿人口

地球上将有八十五亿人口 只要其中5%人口

只要其中5%人口

translation.zh: 不少滤水创新技术的发明目的

translation.zh: 我们发明了模拟小肠功能的技术

translation.zh: “为什么小肠有这种再生能力？”

translation.zh:

translation.zh:
以及其他技术

translation.zh: 只要带一杯水上太空就行了

translation.zh: 因为可以不断循环使用

translation.zh: 看着这些创新先锋

translation.zh: 多数在有限的资源条件下

translation.zh:
拯救社区 力挽水危机的狂澜

translation.zh: 但我们不能只仰赖专家

如果我们能向

translation.zh: “今天我能做什么来改善水源？”

translation.en: The answers are all around us.
translation.zh: 答案就在周围

translation.en: We can be more mindful of our own water usage
translation.zh: 我们可以提升用水方面的醒觉

translation.en: and that of our family and friends.
translation.zh: 也鼓励家人和朋友效仿

translation.en: We can research new technologies like the ones we have just seen
translation.zh:
我们可以研究新技术
正如我们刚才所见的科技

translation.en: and apply them in our home, workplace, and community.
translation.zh:
并将新科技应用在家里
工作场所和社区中

translation.en: We can support companies showing leadership in water management
translation.zh:
我们可以支持
将废水处理列入领导范围的公司

translation.en: and we can encourage brands we care about
translation.zh: 鼓励我们喜欢的品牌

translation.en: to rethink their water policies.
translation.zh: 鼓励我们喜欢的品牌 重新思考废水处理政策

translation.en: We can pressure our local, regional,
translation.zh:
我们可以向地方
区域乃至全国政府施压

translation.en: and national governments to take tangible action.
translation.zh:
我们可以向地方
区域乃至全国政府施压 敦促对方采取实际行动

translation.en: Letters, emails, petitions, social media campaigns.
translation.zh: 写信、发电邮、请愿 透过社交媒体宣传

translation.en: These things can make an immediate and lasting difference.
translation.zh:
这些行动可马上凑效
带来长远的改变

translation.en: This is a solvable problem, right?
translation.zh: 这是可以解决的问题 不是吗？

translation.en: We know what the answers are.
translation.zh: 我们都知道解决方案

translation.en: We've tested the answers, we've seen the answers out there.
translation.zh:
这些解决方案都经过测试
我们也见识过了

translation.en: We know we can solve this problem.
translation.zh: 我们都知道这是可以解决的问题

translation.en: It's just a matter of putting together the business model,
translation.zh:
只是要针对解决方案
采取适合的企业模式

translation.en: bringing all the pieces together,
translation.zh: 融会贯通

translation.en: getting governments to provide the proper regulations
translation.zh: 敦促政府提供合适的政策

translation.en: to support to allow water recycling.
translation.zh: 以支持和允许水循环系统

translation.en: [Kimberly Kupiecki] I don't think it's technology that's holding us back from solving our water crisis.
translation.zh:
我不认为科技
是阻挠我们解决水危机的因素

translation.en: It has to do with finance, and politics, and policy.
translation.zh:
我不认为科技
是阻挠我们解决水危机的因素 只是科技需要具备良好的财务规划
以及适合的政策与制度

translation.en: [Cate Lamb] Banks control two-thirds of the world's money.
translation.zh:
世界上三分之二的金钱
都掌握在银行手中

translation.en: If those banks made it a requirement for every loan that is made,
translation.zh: 要是银行规定每一笔贷款

translation.en: that there has to be a water win at the back of that loan,
translation.zh: 都承载着解决水危机的使命

translation.en: what an amazing opportunity that could be.
translation.zh: 那会是多么美好的机会

translation.en: [Glen Daigger] One simple sentence to the public about water
translation.zh:
关于水 我想送给公众 一句简单的话
也就是“要求更多 要求更好”

translation.en: is demand more, demand better.
translation.zh:
一句简单的话
也就是“要求更多 要求更好”

translation.en: It's there.
translation.zh: 因为我们做得到

translation.en: You know, it takes strong leadership
translation.zh: 决定涉入一个从未有人追求过的领域

translation.en: to make decisions to go into areas that haven't been pursued before,
translation.zh: 需要强大的领导力

translation.en: but to do it because we know that it's the right thing.
translation.zh:
但坚持这么做
是因为我们知道这是对的事

translation.en: It's the right thing for our society. It's the right thing for our environment.
translation.zh: 对我们的社会和环境而言是对的事

translation.en: It's the right thing for the future of humanity.
translation.zh: 对人类的未来而言是对的事

translation.en: [Narrator] For some of us, action might simply take the form
translation.zh: 某些人要才去的行动

translation.en: of recognizing the ineffable value of water
translation.zh: 不外乎是认可水无可言喻的价值

translation.en: and being willing to pay the price for such a precious resource,
translation.zh: 并愿意为如此珍贵的资源付出

translation.en: even in regions where water appears to be plentiful.
translation.zh: 即使是生活在不缺水的地方

translation.en: Just as climate change has sparked grassroots activism across the planet,
translation.zh: 气候变化在全球掀起草根示威运动

translation.en: the water crisis too requires massive mobilization of people
translation.zh: 水危机也需要大量真正关心

translation.en: who truly care about our shared future.
translation.zh: 人类共同未来的人采取行动

translation.en: I think quite frankly,
translation.zh:
说真的
我认为我们成功在年轻一代之间

translation.en: we create a movement amongst the younger generation
translation.zh:
说真的
我认为我们成功在年轻一代之间 创造出一场运动
因为年轻人绝不能忍受

translation.en: and they will simply not tolerate
translation.zh:
创造出一场运动
因为年轻人绝不能忍受

translation.en: that we do things as status quo.
translation.zh: 我们满足于现状

translation.en: [Narrator] Each positive step we take,
translation.zh: 我们积极踏出的每一个脚步

translation.en: every innovation we employ,
translation.zh: 采取的每一项技术

translation.en: every progressive policy initiative we enact
translation.zh: 颁布的每一条支持进步的新政策

translation.en: moves the needle further and further away from catastrophe.
translation.zh: 都让我们一步步地远离灾害

translation.en: This can happen in our lifetime. This has to happen in our lifetime
translation.zh:
这是我们有生之年会实现的事
必须在我们有生之年发生

translation.en: or we are looking at a very different world
translation.zh: 不然就放眼另一个世界

translation.en: for our children.
translation.zh: 属于我们孩子的世界

translation.en: We want to see the government committed
translation.zh: 我们希望政府能致力于

translation.en: in putting in money and supporting sanitation to be a reality to everyone.
translation.zh:
投资在提升卫生条件上
让每户人家都拥有卫生设施

translation.en: [Matt Damon] We envision a day when everybody has access to clean water and sanitation,
translation.zh:
我们希望有朝一日
所有人都能享用净水和卫生设施

translation.en: and we envision that in our lifetime.
translation.zh: 我们希望这天发生在我们有生之年

translation.en: We're on the brink of being hopeless,
translation.zh: 我们徘徊在绝望边缘

translation.en: but we're not there yet.
translation.zh: 但还不至于绝望

translation.en: And if we really come together, we can make a difference.
translation.zh: 只要我们同心协力 一定能带来改变

translation.en: And if you look at these people that are doing amazing things around the world,
translation.zh: 看看这些在世界各地立下大功的人

translation.en: you start to be inspired
translation.zh:
我们一定会受到鼓舞
因为我们相信…

translation.en: 'cause you're like we can make a difference.
translation.zh: “我们可以带来改变”

translation.en: Like how lucky are we
translation.zh:
如果解决问题的人是我们
那会是多么幸运？

translation.en: that we're the ones who get to solve this?
translation.zh:
如果解决问题的人是我们
那会是多么幸运？ 100年以后 那些人也会希望
他们有能力解决这么大的危机

translation.en: In 100 years, people are gonna wish they could solve a problem this big.
translation.zh:
100年以后 那些人也会希望
他们有能力解决这么大的危机
